text: Abella Danger (born November 19, 1995) is an American pornographic actress and model. Abella Danger made her pornography debut in July 2014 for Bang Bros. She has appeared in mainstream news media other than adult news media. This includes the websites Elite Daily and International Business Times. In 2018, Fortune said she was one of the most popular and in-demand performers in the pornographic business. == Early life == She was born in Miami, Florida. == Awards == Year Event Award Film 2016
